title: Linking Error:  relocation R_X86_64_32 against `cpuinfo_x86_linux_init' can not be used when making a shared object
body_html:
• OS: Ubuntu 16.04.2
  • PyTorch version: a3bd7b2..e3e0c34
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): source
  • Python version: 3.5.2
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: N/A
  • GPU models and configuration: N/A
  • GCC version (if compiling from source): 5.4.0

[ 87%] Linking CXX shared library libATen.so
/usr/bin/ld: /usr/local/lib/libcpuinfo.a(init.c.o): relocation R_X86_64_32 against `cpuinfo_x86_linux_init' can not be used when making a shared object; recompile with -fPIC
/usr/local/lib/libcpuinfo.a: error adding symbols: Bad value
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/build.make:2039: recipe for target 'src/ATen/libATen.so.1' failed
make[2]: *** [src/ATen/libATen.so.1] Error 1
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:179: recipe for target 'src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:129: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2

- OS: Ubuntu 16.04.2
- PyTorch version: a3bd7b2..e3e0c34
- How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): source
- Python version: 3.5.2
- CUDA/cuDNN version: N/A
